攻.definition: to attack; to accuse; to study; (LGBT) top

攻伐.definition: to attack; to raid; (of medicine) potent

攻克.definition: to capture; to take; to overcome; to solve

攻入.definition: to force entrance into; to score a goal (sport)

攻其不備.definition: see 出其不意，攻其不備|出其不意，攻其不备[chu1 qi2 bu4 yi4 , gong1 qi2 bu4 bei4]

攻其無備.definition: see 出其不意，攻其不備|出其不意，攻其不备[chu1 qi2 bu4 yi4 , gong1 qi2 bu4 bei4]

攻占.definition: to seize control of (an enemy position); (fig.) to take by storm; to gain (awards, control of a market etc)

攻城略地.definition: to take cities and seize territories (idiom)

攻堅.definition: to assault a fortified position; (fig.) to concentrate one's efforts on a particularly difficult part of one's mission

攻堅克難.definition: to tackle a thorny problem and overcome its challenges

攻心.definition: to mount a psychological attack; to try to demoralize; to try to win over; to try to persuade; (TCM) to fall into a coma or stupor due to an excess of emotion

攻擊.definition: to attack; to accuse; to charge; an attack (terrorist or military)

攻擊型核潛艇.pinyin: gong1 ji1 xing2 he2 qian2 ting3

攻擊線.definition: the front line; the attack (e.g. football forwards)

攻無不克，戰無不勝.pinyin: gong1 wu2 bu4 ke4 , zhan4 wu2 bu4 sheng4
攻無不克，戰無不勝.definition: to triumph in every battle and win every fight (idiom); all-conquering; ever victorious; nothing they can't do

攻略.definition: (literary) to storm and capture; strategy; directions; guide; how-to

攻破.definition: to make a breakthrough; to break through; to breach (military)

攻訐.definition: to attack sb by exposing faults; to denounce

攻讀.definition: to major (in a field); to study a specialty to obtain a higher degree

攻關.definition: to storm a strategic pass; fig. to tackle a key problem

攻防.definition: attack and defense; the midfield (in soccer)

攻陷.definition: to capture (a fortress, city etc); to take by force
